ISSUE.TITLE: Certs not propagated on hyperV
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: ### Issue Description HTTP_PROXY and Cert files are not propagated into the machine on start ### Steps to reproduce the issue Steps to reproduce the issue 1. set HTTP_PROXY, SSL_CERT_FILE, SSL_CERT_DIR 2. podman machine ssh printenv ### Describe the results you received Certs propagated into the machine ### Describe the results you expected See that the vars are not set ### Additional environment details HyperV

BUGGYCOMMIT.MESSAGE: Merge pull request #20117 from baude/hypervsettest hyperv: machine e2e tests for set command

COMMIT.MESSAGE: Skip proxy test for hyperV Currently proxys are not supported on hyperV, skip the test and document it for now. Opened https://github.com/containers/podman/issues/20129 to track the issue. Signed-off-by: Ashley Cui <acui@redhat.com>
